channel.title: Ubuntu 10.10 Sound messed up
channel.description: I use Ubuntu 10.10 and recently I've begun to have problems with gmail chat. After a few minutes of video chatting the sound changes to a screeching white noise, but the other person can still hear me. In a few minutes it reverts at a lowered volume and then it goes back to static after another few. I didn't have these problems before, and the only other sound problems I have noticed are with minecraft sound lagging/stopping sometimes. I didn't use to have this problem and I first noticed it today. I did do a firefox update though...

item.title: Ubuntu 10.10 Sound messed up
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I use Ubuntu 10.10 and recently I’ve begun to have problems with gmail chat. After a few minutes of video chatting the sound changes to a screeching white noise, but the other person can still hear me. In a few minutes it reverts at a lowered volume and then it goes back to static after another few. I didn’t have these problems before, and the only other sound problems I have noticed are with minecraft sound lagging/stopping sometimes. I didn’t use to have this problem and I first noticed it today. I did do a firefox update though…
